website_summaries.verdict: An Alexa-compatible smart plug that takes the guesswork out of remotely turning on and off your devices.
pros: Compatible with any smartphone or tablet, including Android and Apple iOS devices
Can be set up instantly with a WiFi connection and works without a separate hub
Provides overload protection for added safety
Compact design so you can carry the smart plug with you when you travel
cons: Not intended for use with air conditioners, microwaves, and other high-power electrical devices

customer_reviews.title: Long range connection
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten a couple plugs of another brand earlier and discovered that the connection to our outdoor light (inconveniently located in a basementish level 2 floors under the router) only worked occasionally, even with the wifi extender I used. I was debating options and got this plug for another light I had on a timer that operates from a floor plug. I had hoped it would fit into the recessed plug (it didn't--a bit too big) and thought I would try it for the outdoor light and was pleasantly surprised to see that it stays connected substantially more (like 95% vs 50%) than the first smart plug I got.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION - Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a way to contact an elderly person that their phone was off the hook (a new problem we are having). I tried to come up with many things (and a cell phone was out, as they are legally blind). Then BOOM - this comes along. I have plugged a lamp into it (a bright one) and have instructed this person if they see that light flash over and over, they need to check the phones to see if they are off the hook. Works from cell phone - anywhere I am. Just perfect !!!!
customer_reviews.author: JulzC

customer_reviews.title: Manufactured Cheaply | May Pose Fire Hazard
customer_reviews.text: Plugs lasted a couple of weeks and now only work half the time. One has single marks around the plastic, meaning it has burned out. Potential fire hazard. I’d say I got a bad one, but both of the plugs I ordered stopped working. Very disappointed in this product. Would not recommend. I am updating my review to include additional information about my transaction. The company reached out to me to issue a refund. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Works great for seasonal lights timers.
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I use them for seasonal lights with the timer. They even work outdoors as long as you protect them from rain/water. They also work well for timed night lights in the kids room. The oy drawback is the app doesn't work with the newer routers that can't manually switch to 2.4 GHz. I had to use an extender that defaults to 2.4 ghz to make sure they work. Thankfully I already had this piece when setting them up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend rectangular plugs instead
customer_reviews.text: These plugs work fine. Hook up to alexa and switch on and off with no problems. Because of their shape they will partially block the second plug in an outlet though. These are good for use in an outdoor outlet. Modern outdoor outlets have a box around them that is too small to allow the use of a rectangular plug. But these plugs will fit. There is still the problem of blocking the second socket in the outlet, but at least one of these smart plug can be used if there is a need for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Not for use with high power electronics
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these in my house. Once you figure our the initial setup they're pretty straightforward, and they do work with my Alexa. However, I've blown two of these out with my hair dryer (800 watts), which is a shame, the reason I bought them was so I could make sure my straightener was turned off if I got to work and wondered if I remembered to unplug it... I'll have to find a different brand, the last one I purchased only lasted 15 minutes. So, great for lamps, not great with everything.
customer_reviews.author: wendy wright

customer_reviews.title: These plugs are fantastic - and some of the cheapest I could find ...
customer_reviews.text: These plugs are fantastic - and some of the cheapest I could find on amazon. You can toggle or schedule them with the product's app, or simply integrate them with Alexa for full voice control. Currently I have my home media/computer system and my bedroom lights running on them and I just ordered two more today. I haven't had a single issue, set-up was straightforward and pain-free. Highly recommend for Alexa users. I haven't evaluated them with any other voice control methods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Connected once fine; cannot reconnect after router change
customer_reviews.text: I don't recall having problems with this when I purchased it, but I had to get a new router and now I cannot get either plug to connect. I've followed the directions (1) in the app, (2) on this page, (3) in the user comments. Nada. Neither device will connect. (Yes, I am on the 2.4 network, not the 5.) I am just going to throw these away. I have spent far too much time trying to connect them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best smart socket ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these and purchased twice they work great. They are a little large for using on a power strip with other plugs but otherwise no complaints and the software is awesome I love it! Idk why I did not get these sooner. Can be used stand alone without an elexa is a plus for me. I just needed for lights in a timed power fir on and off. I will definitely purchase again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Penneylane

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine as an on/off only switch.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and set up was easy but when using the timer function not only does it turn on a bit late but sometimes it doesn't turn on at all. Works just fine as an on/off only switch. Update: After a few updates the switch started working everyday for the timer but there is still a delay but is only about 30 seconds so not really an issue. I have updated my review to 4 star. I have had the switches for a few months now and they are still working so that is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: loco1529

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and inexpensive compared to many other ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and inexpensive compared to many other Alexa enabled wall plug outlets if you want basic on/off functionality. Other outlet plugs that I've purchased have more rule options in their Android or IoS applications such as the ability to turn on/off based on rules like turn on 15 minutes before sunset or turn off at 10:00 PM. The supporting application for this doesn't offer quite as much flexibility, but it you're just needing basic on off under voice control, they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Complicated to Install
customer_reviews.text: This smart plug really looks good for its price. However, there are two major flaws:- it is complicated to install; and it is so bulky that it encroaches on the second outlet on the power socket. In other words, you can only have the smart plug plugged into the power socket and you cannot use the other outlet for any other electrical device. Installing the plug requires you to download some third party app. I got the Amazon Smart Plug and that plugs in and installs seamlessly in the Amazon Alexa App. While the latter is more expensive, it is designed to allow the usage of both sockets, which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Dimmy

customer_reviews.title: Set up 6 of them in 15 minutes. Coolest new gadget
customer_reviews.text: Installed 6 yesterday. Takes about 60 seconds per switch, then I had to permission (share) with my wife's phone so she could access remotely on phone .. and permission with her alexa account. They work VERY fast (less than 200ms) and flawlessly. I have not tried the "dim lights" yet..
customer_reviews.author: T. Noyes

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: Although the style of these Smart Life receptacles was slightly different than the first four I purchased a year ago, I had no problem hooking them up to my home WIFI using the current Smart Life app. that I had on my phone. I use them with my Google Assistane to turn household lights on and off and they work well. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: lowrider5564

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: I just set up one of these to my living room light and it is so convenient. I set mine up to work with Alexa. The instructions were very vague. You need to download the Smart Life app and create an account and then set the device up and then go into the Alexa app and add a new device and search for Smart Life so it will sync. Also while connecting to your wifi ensure you are on the 2.4GHz and not the 5GHz.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims to do.
customer_reviews.text: Setup is okay, but a lengthy process. The size and shape of these plugs makes use of the remaining outlet pretty limited. Everything seems to run on a power brick these days. Plan ahead, which devices are you turning on/off or timing? What will you call them? Groups names, etc. unless you live alone you’ll need to get agreement on these things to keep the peace and get some usefulness out of this technology.
customer_reviews.author: SDJim

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for outdoor Christmas lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with Alexa to run my Christmas lights. One outlet controlled all of my outdoor Christmas lights, and the other outlet controlled the indoor Christmas tree. I kept one in my garage with below-freezing temperatures and it still continued working perfectly. These outlets worked flawlessly throughout the entire Christmas season. I simply told Alexa to turn on the Christmas tree or the Christmas lights and it was that easy.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Still and excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Took me a minute to hook up because i had to change my wifi to 2 instead of the 5 i was on. I had to google my issue to find out why it wasnt connecting. But, once it connected 😊 . I used the plug on a light and now can control it from my phone where ever I am at. I actually bought these to use on my TV but they do not work if you want to turn your TV on and off. Still and excellent buy
customer_reviews.author: easye

customer_reviews.title: The are great for TV and lights
customer_reviews.text: I like that these integrate well with Alaxa, they are reasonably easy to setup. They are nearly instantanious after I ask Alaxa to turn on or off the device. I currently have 2, and just ordered another 2. They work great for the few light fixtures I have that don't work with Hue light bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: They work great. I bought them to have more plugs to ...
customer_reviews.text: They work great. I bought them to have more plugs to go with my smart life app and my amazon echo dot. I use one for my lava lamp and have it on a schedule for the week (it can only be on for 5 hours then the lamp stuff just stays at the top) and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan F

customer_reviews.title: Great....Briefly....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in December, and hooked them up in January. They worked great, for a while! One of them still works, but the other stopped working completely. I contacted support through the app, and they walked me around and around different things to try, but the device is dead. I inquired about a replacement, but they told me they couldn't help with that. I think they're too expensive to only work for a few months, so I won't be purchasing any more of this device from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wellman

customer_reviews.title: Simple, functional, and small enough to fit almost anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a lot of people saying the installation was complex, but I had no issues at all. If you use the app that was intended for them, it's incredibly simple, and I did not have to be anywhere near my router. I set one up downstairs and one upstairs. Took less than 5 minutes for each and they work perfectly. These things are cheap, small, and well worth buying. I'd recommend these to anyone that wasn't looking for anything too complex.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kianka

customer_reviews.title: Good, but one minor complaint.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is having a separate, but identical app for setting up these devices. The ones I purchased a few months ago use an app that looks the same with a different name, but while the devices are found in either app, only the "native" app works. Once set, Alexa works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Biermann

customer_reviews.title: Great little plugs!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little plugs! I bought 2 a few months ago and just bought more because they’re so great! On occasion they have needed to be reconnected, but that is so quick and simple it’s no big deal. 99.9% of the time they work perfectly! The smart life app even remembers your WiFi password so when you do have to reconnect you don’t have to remember (or hunt down) that awful code. It makes reconnecting or adding new plus super easy. These are perfect for those items you can reach easily or just because you love smart home devices. I’d totally buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Had It working in around 3 minutes. Works flawlessly with Alexa. Easiest setup of all of my home automation gizmos. There is a 2 minute lag from when you first set up your account and bind it to your phone numbert until Alexa can enable. Suddenly it pops up and just works. I only wish they sold these in multipacks (maybe four or six or twelve at a discount)
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Setup
customer_reviews.text: These exceeded my expectations. Once I downloaded the Smart Life app, I had them setup in a matter of minutes. A side note was that the Smart Life app also allows voice commands. Next step is to hook them up to Amazon Alexa. Sooo good that I ordered two more.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Home automation on a budget
customer_reviews.text: I've used some before so this 2nd set was easy to install because the software was already installed to support the new products. I've completed 1 room and have moved on to others. Home automation was really a rich person's endeavor so I've been trying lesser cost products so I can suggest them to the common public. So far, most everything has been working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Leopold

customer_reviews.title: Arrived very late and isn't user friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a Christmas gift for my sister. They arrived too late to give to her so I was going to keep for myself since I have the Echo Look. You need a telescope to read the instructions they sent. I am pretty tech savvy so I plugged in and so on but could not get them to work. I am returning!
customer_reviews.author: Christy C

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I can control my lights from anywhere ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I can control my lights from anywhere across the States. Have had zero issues with the 2 I purchased. They are on the large side making it difficult to plug in something beside it. Wish the company made different compatible items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: **Updated** - so far so good...(original - Becomes disconnected more othen than connected)
customer_reviews.text: *Update* LinkStyle reached out to me to address my issues regarding the outlets. To satisfy my issues they sent me a replacement of the outlets I previously ordered. Since using the new outlets I have not run into any issues with connectivity. It is possible the first set was faulty. Hopefully the replacements will continue to operate as intended. Original: My smart outlets were just delivered a few days ago and already they are disconnecting multiple times a day, showing offline in the app and not responding to Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: These worked great for a day or so and now they seem ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for a day or so and now they seem to be disconnecting and have to be totally reset every other day. Way more hassle than they are worth at this point
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and works with the Smart Life app. Even allows for setting a schedule or a timer. Sadly, once I started putting lamps on voice control, I wasn't using lamps without voice control. I already had a couple of devices on the Smart Life app. Took less than five minutes to add two new items to Alexa voice command in the house.
customer_reviews.author: S. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Failed in 10 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wifi outlet set in December 2017 and one plug failed in September 2018. No warranty information is present in the Amazon description- just a direction to contact the seller; I am going to accept my losses and move on to a different product. The app leaves something to be desired as well. The price point was excellent, so if you subscribe to the phrase "You get what you pay for," then I got what I paid for - a cheap price for a cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 and I had lots of issues. Yes, I did try some of the steps listed on other reviews. I eventually got one to work, but it would make a clicking noise every time it was used. It was very obnoxious. I could hear it across the room. I might have kept it anyway, but I could not get the other one to work at all, so I returned both. I did get my refund. That was good
customer_reviews.author: RogerM

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Linked to Amazon Echo where more expensive Belkin Memo would not. Relatively easy to set up, although a complete novice would have trouble. (The instructions could be printed in bigger type.) Haven't plugged in high wattage devices yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mean Dean

customer_reviews.title: ... 4 of them to be exact and they worked fine until I renamed my router and reset my password ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product 4 of them to be exact and they worked fine until I renamed my router and reset my password then they never worked again, However, oddly enough I gave my grandson one who lives in another state and didn't rename his router/password but it also stopped working as well. All I get is Failed to Add try again and so does he, I have tried over 20 times and all three that I have say the same thing. How frustrating and a waste of my valuable time. Not to mention there is no help in trouble shooting the issue because they come from china.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months, two of the three work fine but the third will not come online no matter what. It started out fine, then suddenly disconnected and won’t re-link. Very disappointing. Also no way to contact company for replacement or how to resolve.
customer_reviews.author: Size11Steever

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for these to arrive, however, the excitement quickly faded. The instructions are simple and I figured I would have these synced up in no time. I could never get the outlets to connect to WiFi, even using the AP mode. I couldn’t for the life of me figure out to troubleshoot. After trying and trying and trying, I realized they were a lost cause and promoplt returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Devyn Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to setup - just plug it and follow the instructions in the app it tells you to download. Easy setup with Alexa, too, just by adding to Alexa Skills. Hard to beat the price, especially since you get two of them. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Love, use the plugs for the bedroom light and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love, use the plugs for the bedroom light and fans. Can control from vacation using the App. Have one in the living room as well. Really want one for the TV and garage doors so you never have to worry if you closed it!
customer_reviews.author: ChampAmy

customer_reviews.title: "Alexa turn on the lamp" *click*
customer_reviews.text: One step closer to letting Alexa run my life. I love it. If you and Alexa aren't speaking you can also control it from your phone. You can also put it on a timer. Want your space heater to turn off automatically when you run out the door? Done. Want your lamp to turn on when you have to wake up at 5am? Done. Want your crock pot to turn on before you get home from work? Done.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Works Ok, Setup Was Easy Enough, They Are Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but they are bulky. Also, no fault of their own, but these don’t work with items that need to be manually be turned on. You can shut them off using Alexa or the app, but you that’s it. If you have a particular item in mind for this outlet, try unplugging & plugging it back in to make sure it just goes back on automatically.
customer_reviews.author: SJU82

customer_reviews.title: Great smart outlet with easy integration with Alexa and Google
customer_reviews.text: Excellent outlets with very easy setup. Easy integration with both Google Home and Amazon Echo. Working flawlessly for past month. The only drawback is that while it does not block the second in-wall outlet, it does it make it difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: PacTips

customer_reviews.title: Unit quit functioning after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I order two of these. The one I used to power a small crockpot (well below the power rating the unit) has failed after 3 months. The unit will react to signals but will not provide output. The switch is stuck in the N/O position causing no power to be delivered to the device connected to it.
customer_reviews.author: Brent A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not Consistent
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a lot of problems with these plugs. I ordered one pair, and one plug didn’t work. Amazon sent a replacement. In the second pair, another plug did not work. It was never recognized by the app. The two I have that do function do so on an infrequent basis and say the device is unresponsive, even though my WiFi for everything else works. I’ve purchased a different brand of plugs altogether but I absolutely do not recommend these!!! And there’s no way to get in touch with the manufacturer, either. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Have echo, have lights, get this.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice option to help control lights and other small appliances using echo or other such devices without the added cost of adding a hub. Easy to setup and control. If you have a Amazon echo or Google home I would recommend this. If I had to find any issues with it I would like to see a UL listing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: Simple setup, works with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I've just added a couple more of these outlets to my increasingly smart home. Setup is easy using the Smart Life app for iPhone and you can then use this to build scheduled on / off times with a bunch of useful options. Alexa voice commands allow you to over-ride the schedule temporarily.
customer_reviews.author: Doug the Brit

customer_reviews.title: Works great, with or without echo device. No hub needed.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with these switches. Setup was pretty easy on the smart-life app on my android, and then works well when talking through the Dot (Alexa). Can also just use the smart-life app if you don't have an Echo device to control, but the voice control is so much smoother. Didn't need a special hub.
customer_reviews.author: D.C

customer_reviews.title: Would not connect to wifi
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a two pack of these smart plugs. Neither of them would connect to my wifi. I made sure it was running at 2.4 GHz. Tried for over an hour. I even set them up on a plug right next to my router and they would not work. Returned right away.
customer_reviews.author: AMY N

customer_reviews.title: Hoping customer service comes through
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love how these work however; I have had them for almost one month now and one has stopped working. It still shows as active and the light turns on and off but no power is supplied through the device itself. I have tested the outlet and the other smart outlet and they both work fine, no matter where I use it no power comes from the unit when I have something plugged in. Will update pending response from LinkStyle.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: After full year, still working great
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these smart outlets for over 1 year to manage lights in different areas of my home. So far, they have worked perfectly. I'm extremely happy with them. They were easy to link with Alexa and I also appreciate the simplicity of their own phone app for scheduling and easy on/off.
customer_reviews.author: MN Dad

customer_reviews.title: LinkStyle 2 Packs Mini Smart Wifi Socket Plug
customer_reviews.text: Devices are okay. The software is horrible. It took forever to get set-up and it is very difficult to use the IOS app. I have other very similar devices that have a much better and usable interface. Will not buy any more of these.
customer_reviews.author: P. Fitzsimmons

customer_reviews.title: Good automation
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't need a hub with alexa, so we have lots of these on the "free standing" lamps on the house. Priced right and without the expense of a hub, which is the next step as we start to do the ceiling lights.
customer_reviews.author: Mlkcrawford

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart Plugs
customer_reviews.text: Just received 2 smart plugs and they work great!! They connected to WiFi in about 30 seconds and were ready to roll! It’s great being able to put them on a schedule and having remote control from the App! Very good product!!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: So far-so good
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to setup...seems to be working fine.. going on vacation in a few weeks so I wanted to be able to turn lights on and off periodically. We'll seem how manageable from a distance in a few weeks. I will never able to check status from alarm system cameras to be sure..not bad for the price to make home a smart home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great for turning on and off my lights from my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great for turning on and off my lights from my phone. really easy to set up and great for when I’m on vacation I could just turn them on and off and not even have to worry
customer_reviews.author: danielle sitarski

customer_reviews.title: Easy to configure and integrated with Echo Dot Plus seamlessly.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to configure and integrated with Echo Dot Plus seamlessly. I plan on purchasing more from Linkstyle.
customer_reviews.author: Sicario

customer_reviews.title: Great item!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My purpose was to use with Alexa. Once you get past the learning curve with both devices they work great. Just be careful to name carefully so items don't turn on unexpectedly.My first smart purchase for home with Alexa. Great comoanion. I use in my bedroom to turn light on and off
customer_reviews.author: Sonj

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle just buy google plug!
customer_reviews.text: I never did get these to work with Alexa, you have to download apps then try to sync it with Alexa, so not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.author: Sharice Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Simple Setup
customer_reviews.text: I am an old, not tech savvy, guy but, these smart pugs were pretty simple to set up. Once paired with your home Internet router, Alexa will find them and sync pretty quickly. It;s easy to rename each plug for what you want Alexa to control. You can control plugs with voice commands through Alexa devices or on your smart phone. I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Danny R.

customer_reviews.title: Slightly to big to fit nicely in a double socket.
customer_reviews.text: They do the job, and I got them working quite easy with Alexa. My only complaint is that they are slightly too big and if you have a standard double socket you can't fit in another plug next to them. It means you lose a socket. But the company customer service is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Sturt

customer_reviews.title: Wishful thinking
customer_reviews.text: No-no-no! This items worked great for a while with all my accessories, but then TOTALLY messed up the on and off settings and had to use my app to manage. Don't waste your money. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.author: Dino Del Toro

customer_reviews.title: Bad App, Had to Return
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because the app for iPhone won't let you register the product, I tried online but I could find a way to create a login.
customer_reviews.author: Michael I.

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect to 2.4 GHz WiFi
customer_reviews.text: This product had a lot of promise. I thought it’s integration would be just as seamless as other smart plugs such as the TP-link Kasa. Unfortunately this was a major headache to setup. And their size makes it very difficult to fit on to traditional power outlets. I believe that this product was made for Europe and should not be used in America. I regret not investing more in smartplugs.
customer_reviews.author: Dom Zagara

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the SmartLife iOS app!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the two-pack for $20...literally took 3 minutes to pair them with the SmartLife app! I'm using one to switch on/off an electromagnetic lock for my doggy door from anywhere in the world; love these things!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Alexa. The size of the plug ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well with Alexa. The size of the plug however prevents using the second plug on a 2 gang plug without using some kind of adapter.
customer_reviews.author: VA BCH

customer_reviews.title: App did not detect plugs
customer_reviews.text: I spent 2 hours trying to get these to work. Just be aware that these don't work directly with the Google Home App; you have to use the Smart Life App, which is written in broken English by the way. The funny thing is the manufacturer's app actually doesn't detect these plugs so they are being returned.
customer_reviews.author: SkiMan001

customer_reviews.title: The light turned OFF n ON
customer_reviews.text: Take A bit time to set up. When the lights is ON every now and then the light turned OFF and ON. A bit annoying. Great customer services on try to help with the problems and even sent new plugs for free. The new plugs still acting the same, not sure what going.
customer_reviews.author: Phathakone Sanethavong

customer_reviews.title: smart plugs. I think they are made by the ...
customer_reviews.text: work just as well as my other, LYASI, smart plugs. I think they are made by the same company, just a different configuration, these are a little more compact. They both use the same app to operate, so that was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.P.

customer_reviews.title: Seems I wasted my
customer_reviews.text: No longer connects to my new Google Wifi Mesh system. Both 2.4 and 5 are on the same ID. Seems I wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Techie Beach Bum

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Oddly it does seem to take 2 command with alexa for the response to happen more often than not. But they work and all in all I'm happy with the purchase. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen MacNeil

customer_reviews.title: these are great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these having low expectations but so far they have exceeded them. I use one for automating lights on my office and another one for automating lights on the living room when we are away
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Read and follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: because it is not a Alexa product, you must download the smart plug app, and sync it to the Alexa app, Not hard,but read and follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Eddyjoe

customer_reviews.title: Great small size, just no power stats!
customer_reviews.text: Wireless range could probably be just a bit better, but hey look how small the plug is. The only thing I was expecting, and really miss not having, is the ability to see the power usage stats like my other WiFi plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Randy W.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give this negative stars.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. It is the WORST of all similar products with hidden costs very intentionally and very shadily added. Be forewarned. I would return, but they won’t let you. Beware. Avoid. Shady knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Maria

customer_reviews.title: Get the right app, instructions are wrong, could not enable
customer_reviews.text: Wow...these are awful. Took three tries to find the right app to download from the App Store. The printed instructions were wrong. Then tried multiple times to enable them, and couldn't do it., worthless...going return them and order WeMos, which I have for other plugs. And...these are a bit big and don't allow all plug types to be used in the other plug.
customer_reviews.author: Kris M

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work with 802.11a (5Ghz) WiFi
customer_reviews.text: I have used these smart plugs on my own home 802.11 b (2.4Ghz) system without any issues. They work great. Unfortunately, I did not read the fine print and they do not work at all on 5Ghz WiFi systems, so I am stuck with 4 that I just purchased as a gift for a family member (who only has 5Ghz Wifi available where they are living).
customer_reviews.author: N. Shuman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't reliably work with Alexa Routines
customer_reviews.text: Product worked at first, but now it works sporadically. It doesn't play nicely with Alexa Routines, which turns on / off smart home devices paired with Alexa Smart Home at a set time. For example, in the morning at a set time, only one of these will turn off when both should. Other mornings, it'll be the opposite socket and not the other. I'm not sure if it's a software, hardware or integration with Alexa issue, but because this is the reason that I bought these, I can't recommend them. I'm now past the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these. I them connected to my tart burners ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I them connected to my tart burners and they were so simple to set up and connect too. Also, you can share it with people! So both my husband and I have the app and are able to turn on and off or adjust the time for everyone we have. You also can "name" the plug so you're able to know which one you're editing.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Schu

customer_reviews.title: Added Convenience
customer_reviews.text: I initially had some difficulty linking the smart plug to my Echo Dot, the problem was with my Wi-Fi and not the plug. Once connected it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nifty device
customer_reviews.text: These plugs were easy to install and connect with Alexa. I'm really enjoying them and will probably order more.
customer_reviews.author: jthughes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and work as expected. You are able to control from the smart life app and amazon echo. I have mine set on a schedule so the lights plugged into these outlets turn off when not needed to save on our electricity bill. This is my second order of these products. I now need to get the light switches!
customer_reviews.author: Michael O.

customer_reviews.title: I use a TP-Link smart plug as well
customer_reviews.text: I use one to power cabinet fans I installed in my entertainment center. I come home from work, and when I tell Alexa to turn the fans on, I get “fans is not responding” more frequently than I can tolerate. I will switch the plug out for the other, and hope that only one of them is defective. On a side note, I use a TP-Link smart plug as well, and although not perfect, has been more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Works great with google home
customer_reviews.text: Works great with google home. I have them hooked up to two lamps. Set up was easy and they work as expected
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working already. DO NOT BUY! Jus spend the money and get a better device.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan man

customer_reviews.title: Read the directions carefully
customer_reviews.text: The directions were confusing at first. Once I read it a couple of times I had no problem programing it. My only suggestion is printing the instructions on a larger sheet of paper with larger fonts
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: once I got the hang of it it was fast and easy. Works fine with my Echo-Dot
customer_reviews.text: Setup was a little bit confusing for me, but I am not tech-savvy at all. All in all, once I got the hang of it it was fast and easy. Works fine with my Echo-Dot!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsy Stevenson-Huston

customer_reviews.title: These work great with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: These work great with Alexa. Just getting into the whole voice command scene but these work great and are easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: don't move or change your wifi
customer_reviews.text: I got these back in January and after I got them connected, they worked great without any problems. That is until I moved. I have been trying periodically to set them up since May when I moved but I can not for the life of me get them to connect again. I absolutely loved them and now they are just a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Molly S.

customer_reviews.title: Smart outlets work perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Great smart outlets that work great with Alexa! Easy to set up and install. Use them for my lamps, and they work perfectly! Couldn’t be happier with this product!
customer_reviews.author: JBran

customer_reviews.title: Such an awesome decision to get these
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome decision to get these!!! Time the lights to go on??? No problem!! Can't see in the living room through the cameras???? No problem!!!! Very simple to set up!!! I have one on top of the cabinets in the kitchen so I can have the LED light strip come on at duck and go off at dawn!!! My night light in the kitchen!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Flesch

customer_reviews.title: works fine but it gets disconnected a lot from the WIFI
customer_reviews.text: works fine but it gets disconnected a lot from the WIFI, don't know if is my WIFI or the plug. I returned them because one of them did not worked at all
customer_reviews.author: kcinlb

customer_reviews.title: did not come close to working for me. ymmv.
customer_reviews.text: tried to pair for two hours (probably longer, but i’m kind) and it never worked.
customer_reviews.author: A Guy From Burbank

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work
customer_reviews.text: These did not work for me, tried everything to get them connected. I followed the directions, googled it, even watched a few videos, and they just wouldn’t connect!
customer_reviews.author: NikkiD

customer_reviews.title: but once you download the smart app in Alexa’s app
customer_reviews.text: It was a little tricky to instal at first, but once you download the smart app in Alexa’s app, it worked right away! It’s perfect for those appliances you want to turn on, but isn’t a light bulb!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: struggling to get them to connect. the app that ...
customer_reviews.text: struggling to get them to connect. the app that the product advertises in the directions would not connect to the plugs. got one working, but still can't get the second to connect. considering returning.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, much much better than some of the other ones! Wish they would make them so you can plug two into an outlet easier.. but otherwise good
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Bad size
customer_reviews.text: Yes it works, yes it integrates with Alexa. Unfortunately it's too big so you can't plug anything else into the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Timm

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: They work for awhile and then you have to reset them. I should have paid more for better quality because it gets annoying having to restart them every week.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Trouble Syncing Device To Home Network
customer_reviews.text: I could not sync the device to my WIFI network. I returned the device. I have a WIFI smart plug device installed synced my echo and show. I could not add this device to the network and after over 1 hour I gave up and sent back to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rafaela Rizzon

product_meta.title: Smart Wifi Plug Outlet Compatible with Alexa, LinkStyle 2 Packs Mini Smart Wifi Socket Plug Timing Function No Hub Required Control Your Appliances from Anywhere for iOS Android Smartphones Tablets
feature_bullets: SUPPORT AMAZON ALEXA VOICE CONTROL : Control your home with the power of your voice. Use simple voice command to turn On/Off your lights and appliances.
WiFi SMART PLUG: Smart outlet with wifi connection, enables you to remote control your electronics anywhere and anytime from your smartphone or tablet, life become easier.
TIME SWITCH: Supports setting up timing task and repeat ON/OFF cycle daily for lamps. Your lights will turn on and off randomly to confuse potential intruders and make it look like somebody is home.

REMOTE CONTROL: Remotely turn appliances and electronics on or off from anywhere. At home or when you go out, use Wi-Fi and mobile Networks to operate.Perfect for Household Appliances Lamps, Lighting & Electrical Equipment.

Universal Compatibility: Compatible with any smart phone or tablet including Android and Apple IOS devices controlling directly. Note: Pls don't connect this plug to high power electrical appliances, such as air conditioner, heater, microwave over, and any other appliances with working power over 1100W. This wifi plug is only compatible with 2.4G WiFi.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars660 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
